## Programmable Non-Standard Evaluation

## An Example

```{r}
subset2 <- function(x, subset) {
  stopifnot(is.data.frame(x))
  sub.lang <- recsub(substitute(subset), envir=x, enclos=parent.frame())
  sub.vals <- eval(sub.lang, envir=x, enclos=parent.frame())
  x[sub.vals, ]
}
sub.exp.1 <- quote(Species == 'Setosa')
sub.exp.2 <- quote(Sepal.Length > 5)

subset2(iris, sub.exp.1 & sub.exp.2)
```
